description: While on route to Shippo City, Cilan and his traveling companions Ash and Iris found a group of Ishizumai that were picking on a weaker Ishizumai. The stronger Ishizumai stole the weaker Ishizumai home, a gray rock that it had been working on. Cilan became friends with the Ishizumai and helped it defeat the gang of Ishizumai to recover its home. As Cilan was departing, the Ishizumai didn`t want to part and Cilan realized this, he too had become attached to the Ishizumi and he capture it.
name: Ishizumai (Dent)
